content.heading: You make a living by what you get.. you make a life by what you give..

info.title: Angel Gurría, OECD secretary general.
info.description: Integrity, transparency and the fight against corruption have to be part of the culture. They have to be taught as fundamental values

info.title: Delia Ferreira, chair of Transparency International.
info.description: People’s indifference is the best breeding ground for corruption to grow.

info.title: Peter Eigen, founder of Transparency International.
info.description: People should be conscious that they can change a corrupt system

mission.description: Our Mission is to stop corruption and promote transparency, accountability and integrity at all levels and across all sectors of society.
Our Vision is a world in which government, politics, business, civil society and the daily lives of people are free of corruption.
We undertake to be open, honest and accountable in our relationships with everyone we work with, and with each other.
We will respect and encourage respect for fundamental human rights and freedom.
We will strive for balanced and diverse representation on our governing bodies.
We will provide accurate and timely reports of our activities to our stakeholders.

awards.heading: Award for Volunteering and Participating at the Kalam Book of Records event by contributing to the largest manuscript On World Human Rights Day
Best Organization award at the Social Protection International Peace conference and SPT Peace Awards 2020.
Award for Volunteering support at the Medical Camp in Saligramam
Award for school Renovation of P.U.P.S Govt school , Jamin Korattur by SSA Tamilnadu.

volunteerTestimonials.name: John Abrahram
volunteerTestimonials.description: Bribery is the most common method of Corruption. Bribery involves the improper use of favours and gifts in exchange for personal gain.

volunteerTestimonials.name: Christopher
volunteerTestimonials.description: Extortion is another major method of Corruption. It means to obtain property, money or services illegally.

volunteerTestimonials.name: Rajput
volunteerTestimonials.description: Favouritism and nepotism is quite an old form of Corruption still in usage. This refers to a person favouring one’s own relatives and friends to jobs.
